original: intros. split. - intros a H s' p' HPQ Ps P. apply alwsafe in Ps as Hs. apply H in Hs; clear H. apply alw_imp in Hs; clear Ps. apply Hs; clear Hs. intros s P' H1. apply iffLR with (Q:= alwsafe_sc s' p' scs (fun s' p' => P -> Q s' p')) in H; clear H. apply alwsafe in H. apply H; clear H. intros Hs. apply alwA' in Hs. apply Hs. intros. apply HPQ. apply P. apply P'. - intros H P Hs. apply alw_envsq with (s1:= s) in Hs. apply H; clear H. intros s' H2. apply Hs; clear Hs. apply alw_envs with (s1:= s) in H2. apply H2. apply H.
